articles.description: Newly-crowned Bundesliga champions Bayern Munich finish the season with a 3-0 win against Hoffenheim as Thomas Muller makes his final appearance for the club.
articles.title: Thomas Muller says farewell as Bayern Munich win on final day

articles.description: Jasmine Paolini produces a scintillating display she blows away Coco Gauff in straight sets to end a 40-year wait for a home winner of the women's singles at the Italian Open.
articles.title: Italian Open: Jasmine Paolini beats Coco Gauff to end wait for home women's singles winner

articles.description: Australian Luke Plapp wins stage eight of the Giro d'Italia while Diego Ulissi leads the general classification.
articles.title: Giro d'Italia 2025: Luke Plapp wins stage eight, Diego Ulissi takes overall lead

articles.description: James Forrest scores for a record-breaking 16th consecutive season to make sure trophy day does not fall flat against a spirited St Mirren side who fell just short of European qualification.
articles.title: Celtic vs St Mirren: Scottish Premiership updates & match report - BBC Sport

articles.description: Dean Huijsen will complete a move from Bournemouth to Real Madrid in the summer. BBC Sport looks at his rapid rise.
articles.title: Dean Huijsen to Real Madrid: How Bournemouth defender became one of Europe's most coveted.
